meanings.definition: A balsam obtained from a South American tree, used in perfumery and medicine.
meanings.sent1: The tolu had a pleasant scent that was used to make perfumes.
meanings.sent2: She applied the tolu balsam to her skin to help with the healing process.
meanings.sent3: The tolu balsam was so fragrant that even the flowers in the garden seemed jealous.
meanings.sent4: The tolu balsam wrapped around her like a comforting blanket, soothing her senses.
meanings.sent5: The tolu balsam filled the room with a sweet aroma, calming everyone inside.

meanings.definition: A colorless liquid hydrocarbon obtained from coal tar, used as a solvent.
meanings.sent1: He used tolu as a solvent to dissolve the stubborn stain on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The workers wore protective gear while handling the tolu liquid in the factory.
meanings.sent3: The tolu liquid accidentally spilled, creating a slippery situation in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: The tolu solvent cut through the grime on the machinery like a hot knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The tolu solvent evaporated quickly, leaving behind a clean surface.
